name: 曾德樟
objective:
1.Introduction
2.Fourier Representation of Signals and Systems
3.Amplitude Modulation
4.Angle Modulation
5.Random Signals and Noise
6.Noise in Analog Modulation Systems
schedule:
1.Introduction:
(1). Communication Process
(2). Primary Communication Resources
(3). Modulation Process
(4). Analog / Digital Communication
2.Fourier Representation of Signals and Systems:
(1). Fourier Transform
(2). Linear Systems
(3). Energy Spectral Density and Power Spectral Density
3.Amplitude Modulation:
(1). DSB-LC / DSB-SC
(2). SSB/VSB
(3). Baseband Representation of Modulated Waves
4.Angle Modulation:
(1). PM/FM
(2). Transmission Bandwidth of FM Waves
(3). Demodulation of FM Signals
5.Random Signals and Noise:
(1). Probability and Random Variables
(2). White noise/Narrowband Noise
6.Noise in Analog Modulation Systems:
(1). Band-Pass Receiver Structures
(2). Noise in Analog Modulation Systems
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考、平時考、期末考與作業。
2. 出席率。
materials: Introduction to Analog & Digital Communications 2/E, S. Haykin and M. Moher, John Wiley & Sons, 2007
